text: Giorgi "Gigi" Ugulava (; born 15 August 1975) is a Georgian politician. He was Mayor of Tbilisi (2005â€“2013). He was one of the leader of the United National Movement (UNM) party. Since 2017 he is one of the leaders of European Georgia. ==Mayor of Tbilisi== He was first eleted Mayor of Tbilisi. == References == Category:1975 births Category:Writers from Georgia (country) Category:Mayors Category:Journalists from Georgia (country) Category:Politicians from Tbilisi Category:Living people
